TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VoiceChangeEventArgs extends System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks 实例<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs>时，将创建<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>对象会引发<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>事件。 若要获取新的标识<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>，访问<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A>事件处理程序中的属性。
你可以使用语音<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>与任一<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder>的<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.PromptBuilder.StartVoice%2A>方法或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>的<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoice%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SelectVoiceByHints%2A>方法。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Voice As VoiceInfo
public: property System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceInfo ^ Voice { System::Speech::Synthesis::VoiceInfo ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: 获取新语言的 对象。
Docs.value: 返回描述和标识新语音的信息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceChangeEventArgs.Voice%2A>属性获取<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>对象时<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.VoiceChange>引发事件。
